sentences.en: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.cn: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

sentences.en: He handed up the indictment to the supreme court.
sentences.cn: 他把起诉书送交最高法院.

sentences.en: Her approval was of supreme importance.
sentences.cn: 她的认可是至关重要的。

sentences.en: MacArthur was Supreme Commander for the allied powers in the Pacific.
sentences.cn: 麦克阿瑟将军曾是太平洋战区盟军的最高统帅。

sentences.en: Maguire has appealed to the Supreme Court to stop her extradition.
sentences.cn: 马圭尔已向最高法院提出上诉，要求停止对她的引渡。

sentences.en: Sovereign power will continue to lie with the Supreme People's Assembly.
sentences.cn: 最高统治权仍然掌握在最高人民会议手中。

sentences.en: supreme courage in the face of terrible danger
sentences.cn: 面对可怕危险时的极大勇气

sentences.en: The bicycle reigned supreme as Britain's most popular mode of transport.
sentences.cn: 当时自行车是英国最流行的交通工具。

sentences.en: The lady conspired to seize supreme power.
sentences.cn: 该女士图谋攫取最高权力。

sentences.en: The Pope is the supreme leader of the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.cn: 教皇是罗马天主教的最高领袖.

sentences.en: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
the Supreme Commander of the armed forces
The Supreme Court says that the convictions can stand.
sentences.cn: 最高法院说判决结果依然有效。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court unanimously ruled that racial segregation in schools was unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 联邦最高法院一致裁定学校实行的种族隔离措施违反宪法。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court will not hear the case until next fall.
sentences.cn: 最高法院将于明年秋开始审理此案。

sentences.en: The vice-president must now take on the mantle of supreme power.
sentences.cn: 副总统现在必须承担起最高权力的重任。

sentences.en: This case is being judged by the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 本案正由最高法院审理.

sentences.en: You should go out for Supreme Court justice.
sentences.cn: 你应该参加最高法院法官的选拔。

words.tran_cn: 霸权；至高无上；主权；最高地位

phrases.tran_cn: 最高指挥官；最高统帅；最高司令官
最高上诉法院；最高法院

trans.tran_cn: 最高的，至高的，无上的，最重要的，（程度）很大的
trans.tran_en: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence
